graphql.query:
mutation {
  createBillChargeSetting(
    input: {
      fixedChargeStartMonth: "thisMonth"
      fixedChargeStartDate: 1
      fixedChargeEndMonth: "thisMonth"
      fixedChargeEndDate: 31
      nonFixedChargeStartMonth: "lastMonth"
      nonFixedChargeStartDate: 1
      nonFixedChargeEndMonth: "lastMonth"
      nonFixedChargeEndDate: 31
      transferRefundStartMonth: "lastMonth"
      transferRefundStartDate: 1
      transferRefundEndMonth: "lastMonth"
      transferRefundEndDate: 31
    }
  )
}

mutation {
  updateBillChargeSetting(
    id:"f19b4420-0855-448b-81d6-3d48f8b71da9"
    input: {
      fixedChargeStartMonth: "thisMonth"
      fixedChargeStartDate: 2
      fixedChargeEndMonth: "thisMonth"
      fixedChargeEndDate: 3
      nonFixedChargeStartMonth: "lastMonth"
      nonFixedChargeStartDate: 2
      nonFixedChargeEndMonth: "lastMonth"
      nonFixedChargeEndDate: 3
      transferRefundStartMonth: "lastMonth"
      transferRefundStartDate: 2
      transferRefundEndMonth: "lastMonth"
      transferRefundEndDate: 3
      patientConsumptionRecordStartMonth:"lastMonth"
      patientConsumptionRecordStartDate:2
      patientConsumptionRecordEndMonth:"lastMonth"
      patientConsumptionRecordEndDate:4
    }
  )
}

}

query {
  organization {
    name
    addressCity

    remittanceBank

    nonFixedChargeEndMonth
    nonFixedChargeEndDate
    transferRefundStartMonth
    transferRefundStartDate
    transferRefundEndMonth
    transferRefundEndDate
    printYear
  }
}

query {
  patientBill(patientId:"d3656d15-1964-40cd-b30a-c664fee9838e",billYear:2023,billMonth:4) {
    id
    createdAt
    amountDue
    amountReceived
    amountReceived
    basicCharges {
      id
      itemName
      type
      unit
      price
      taxType
      startDate
      endDate
      note
      receiptStatus
      receiptDate
    }
    subsidies{
        itemName
        type
        unit
        price
        idNumber
        note
        startDate
        endDate
        receiptStatus
        receiptDate
    }    
    nonFixedChargeRecords{
        itemCategory
        itemName
        unit
        price
        quantity
        subtotal
        receiptStatus
        receiptDate
    }
    transferRefundHospitalizeds {
      id
      startDate
      endDate
      reason
      department
      room
      bed
      isReserveBed
      note
      items
      receiptStatus
      receiptDate
    }
    transferRefundLeaves {
      id
      startDate
      endDate
      reason
      isReserveBed
      note
      items
      receiptStatus
      receiptDate
    }
    transferRefundDischarges{
        id
        startDate
        endDate
        reason
        note
        items
        receiptStatus
        receiptDate
    }
    patientConsumptionRecords{
        id
        itemUnit
    }
    note
    editNoteDate
    editNoteUser{
        firstName
        lastName
    }
  }
}

query {
  patientBills(billDate: "2023-04-30T16:00:00.000Z") {
    id
    createdAt
    amountDue
    amountReceived
    cumulativeUnpaidAmount
    basicCharges {
      id
      itemName
      type
      unit
      price
      taxType
      startDate
      endDate
      note
      receiptStatus
    }
    subsidies{
        itemName
        type
        unit
        price
        idNumber
        note
        startDate
        endDate
    }
    note
    editNoteDate
    editNoteUser {
      id
      firstName
    }
    patient {
      id
      firstName
    }
    nonFixedChargeRecords {
      itemCategory
      itemName
      unit
      price
      quantity
      subtotal      
    }
    transferRefundHospitalizeds {
      id
      startDate
      endDate
      reason
      department
      room
      bed
      isReserveBed
      note
      items
      receiptStatus
    }
    transferRefundLeaves {
      id
      startDate
      endDate
      reason
      isReserveBed
      note
      items
      receiptStatus
    }
    transferRefundDischarges {
        id
        startDate
        endDate
        reason
        items
        receiptStatus
    }
    patientConsumptionRecords{
        id
        itemUnit
    }
  }
}
